website_summaries.verdict: This throw is fluffy and cozy while costing less than most of the competition.
pros: An extremely soft throw that's great anywhere
This affordable blanket makes a great gift
cons: Many customers noted that their blankets started shedding over time

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I got the purple and yes it is deep purple like the picture which matches my decor perfectly. Other reviews have commented about it being thin or too thin. I was expecting thinner than what I received based on those reviews. It wasn't too thin. I have definitely felt thinner blankets of the same fabric. It not thick however. I think it's perfect. Washed it and still super soft. No pilling but i washed and dried it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lightweight blanket that's still very fluffy, soft, and super cozy. It's light enough to be a summer blanket but it also keeps you warm enough during the chilly summer to fall nights. It also has two different kind of "textured" sides, one side is more "sleek" and the opposite side is more "fluffy". Has become one of my favorite bIankets, I would definitely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: E. L

customer_reviews.title: Sheds like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: Sheds so much! I tried everuthing, but it keeps shedding. I now have blue balls of fuzz all over my sheets, and my house. They are stuck to the inside of my washer and dryer. It will take forever to get it all cleaned up. I don't understand all of the reviews that said this doesn't shed. Fake reviews?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this blanket. I originally bought it to have on my couch but now I want to buy more. It is a lot lighter than I thought it would be, but still warm. It is SOOOO soft. SO SOFT. A lot softer than expected. I want to keep petting it. My pictures don't really do justice for it, it's a nice deep red color. I will be buying more soon, maybe in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeMeBaby1MoreTime

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft.  Queen Size Barely Fits A Full Bed
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make into the bed, on top the top sheet for extra warmth. As long as the top is pulled down a few inches (maybe 4-6 inches), then this is long enough to tuck into the bottom of the mattress. It hangs in a good position on the sides, and is helping to keep us warm. The seems are all the same (see pictures). It comes in a small roll in the mail. Overall, we love this super soft blanket and I'm sure it will earn a permanent place in our winter linen sets. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Worst Throw Blanket Ever
customer_reviews.text: [[ASIN:B072XGV23K Bedsure Flannel Fleece Luxury Blanket Teal King Size Lightweight Cozy Plush Microfiber Solid Blanket There is lint everywhere. The claims in the description are outright lies. These people should be reported and booked for cheating the customers.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Pilling
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers said, the blanket is very soft. But I also need it to hold up over time. I have learned to always wash sheets or blankets that are plush to make sure that they don't pill. I followed all directions about cold water wash and low heat drying but sad to say the blanket pilled terribly..... I returned it. If you are not going to ever need to wash it or going to just use it as a throw or let the animals have use of it, it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Transplant

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it!
customer_reviews.text: Grey color and size is perfect for a sofa throw and looks great with cream and other greys. So super soft! It's the blankey you've always wanted to cuddle up to. It's light but warm enough for a "chilly" Florida evening. I highly recommend it. Much more comfortable than others I found in stores.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Bad after wash
customer_reviews.text: The blankets is nice when new but when you wash it it turnes into a lint ball. Had to throw mine out.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Like you could hook up some wires to this blanket ...
customer_reviews.text: Everybody only said how soft it was. Nobody said how much static electricity this thing generates. Like you could hook up some wires to this blanket and have some cheap labor move it around and then decommission all the nuclear power plants in the world because this thing would far outproduce them. Literally you get near it and all the hairs on your body stand up straight. You look like a mad scientist after you get out from underneath it. On the other hand, it is very soft.... if you can get over being constantly shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Pierce

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this with no stars I would. first easing and there was purple fuzz and balls all over my washer. I decided to dry it under gentle-balled up so I had to throw it away. This is first negative experience with a blanket thru Amazon. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Magill

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!  DON'T EVER WASH IT!  I only recommend it if you would pay $35 for 2-3weeks use of an oh-so-soft DISPOSABLE blanket.
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!!! TO ALL THOSE PEOPLE WHO RUN IT THROUGH A WASH BEFORE FIRST USE OR WEAR: NEVER WASH THIS BLANKET!!!! Use it until it's too filthy to use anymore then THROW IT AWAY. THE FIRST TIME YOU WASH IT IT SHEDS HORRIBLY BOTH IN THE WASH AND ON THE BED. BUCKETS OF FLUFF EVERYWHERE. Covering the sheets other blankets, your clothes, the carpet..... don't understand all the rave reviews on this blanket. Did everyone write reviews before testing out the product? Can't even let pets use it. constant problem of the fluff getting in their nose and eyes– which get painfully inflamed and gooped up.
customer_reviews.author: prAairhead

customer_reviews.title: Horrific
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is HORRIFIC. made the mistake of washing it with other clothing and it got fuzzies EVERYWHERE. started washing it solo and it looks like it's slowly falling apart. Would have been better off buying a cheapie Walmart blanket
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Going into the trash..
customer_reviews.text: Hasnt been so great. It is soft and a nice shade of purple.. but, it leaves wads of purple fabric everywhere. On clothes, floors, tried to wash it to see if it would help, nope just filled my washer and dryer with purple fleece fuzz balls.. i guess i got what i paid for, will spend more for better quality next time. This one is going into the trash, not even a week old.
customer_reviews.author: KEL GRAFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great , soft , mine !
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket, its really nice and soft. Before buying this i was reading the reviews and think hmm maybe i shouldnt buy it. But i did anyways and right when i got the blanket i wanted to see if it really gets messed up in the dryer. From my view i think people dried this blanket the wrong way. I dried this blanket for 2 hours on low and nothing bad happened . Its really soft and warm . The feel of this blanket is wow. I want to buy another one because of house soft it is. **Tip** Dry this blanket on low
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Sula

customer_reviews.title: Ugh! LINT BALLS Everywhere! Not Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, I washed it as per instructions and nothing but fuzz balls -- everywhere. A few other customers have noted this in the reviews. In an effort to remove the lint balls I washed it twice and dried it twice. STILL, FFS there are lint balls EVERYWHERE. Whatever you do, don't wash it with your clothes; wash it separately. Meanwhile, the camel color is much darker than pictured and expected. I am NOT satisfied. Definitely planning to return this, given it is simply VERY LOW QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: The lint is excessively bad, but very soft blanket if you want to put up with it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice blanket, very soft but the lint is an absolute nightmare. DO NOT WASH WITH YOUR CLOTHES. I have washed this twice so far and it still covers everything else in the washer with lint. I can't get rid of it without a lint roller. Drier sheets don't help. Honestly, I would not have bought this had I known it was this bad but now that I have it, I know that I have to wash it on its own, so I will just try to not use it much.
customer_reviews.author: S. N.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is soft and super light weight material almost cheap like. The quality is very poor. It actually leaves cotton balls of fabric material on the bed. I would strongly not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: raquel vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Awful, sheds like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand how this blanket has gotten such high reviews, unless I just happened to get the one crap one in the barrel. I washed the blanket upon receiving it and didn’t notice until I made the bed up, that there was fluff EVERYWHERE. I rewashed all of my bedding, and the blanket just got worse. Furthermore, I couldn’t get all of the lint and fluff off of the rest of my bedding. So I’m now washing them a THIRD time, hoping that will get the lint and fluff off. It’s all over my clothes. All over the floor. I wake up with it in my hair. It’s horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Main steam stop valve

customer_reviews.title: Not happy! They shed big clumps 😩
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 twin blankets after a month it was time for a wash. Just wash the 2 blankets together as directed and they both shed clumps the size of a quarter. I washed them on cold, gentle & low heat in the dryer. I was so sad to see how horrble they came out! I really loved these blankets they're so soft. I want another set or a refund! Your description says it dosent shed yet both blankets shed! 😩😩😩 No star for you!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ladore

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought similar blankets from amazon and have had them for years. I have dogs and I keep these on the couch to protect the couch and wash the blanket weekly. I put those in 7/4/18 and today 7/6/18 they are tareing and fraying. The ones I bought a year ago are still going strong I just wanted an extra set so I didn’t have to wash them the same day. I would not recommend. Amazon is staring to get junkie with what they carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lhommedieu

customer_reviews.title: This blanket sheds horribly
customer_reviews.text: Worst blanket ever. I wish I had stuffed it back in the packaging and sent it back. I have washed this blanket on a cold, gentle cycle every time. I have dried it on the lowest heated setting that my dryer has every time. As the directions state, it has never had any kind of fabric softener applied to it. It pills up and sheds everywhere no matter what I do. I now have white fuzzy blanket pills on everything from me and my husband to my cats. Very disappointed. Amazon may want to rethink their recommendation. I have bought better, cheaper blankets from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Lint is out of control. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The feel of the blanket is great! I like it BUT the only annoying thing is that the lint is just so freaking out of control. I've washed this blanket twice now and the lint it leaves when used on a bed with other blankets is insane and hard to get rid of. The price is great and the feel is great but I don't think I would recommend this product. I'm sure you can find a better blanket that doesn't leave as much lint laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Adidoreydi

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT BUY! SHEDS WORSE THAN A CAT
customer_reviews.text: Sheds and pills everywhere!! I washed it 4 times! With tennis balls, vinegar, velvet clothes, its endless!!! Im so pissed! I havent even had it two weeks! My dog sheds less than this! It took me two hours with a face razor to hopefully stop it! Wish i could return it! It came and i was so excited because it was super soft and then it covered my bed in yellow fuzz! Ive washed my sheets twice in the first week i had the damn thing! I have 15 year old blankets that have never done this crap! Im so upset! I shouldnt have to break my back hand shaving a NEW blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Blanket Pilling
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Blanket is soft and light weight. Negatives: As with other reviewers, found that the blanket is susceptible to excessive pilling. Directions for washing and drying were followed explicitly. Machine wash by itself on "extra delicate" and machine dry on "delicate" cycle. Surprisingly, found lint trap with very little lint. If seller has other suggestions on how minimized pilling, it would be appreciated! UPDATED REVIEW-After a 2nd laundering (following manufacturer's instructions) the blanket had become unusable due to excessive pilling. As a result the blanket had to be thrown away. The star rating has been reduced to ONE STAR. Based on my experience a DO NOT BUY WARNING IS WARRANTED!!
customer_reviews.author: marcblue

customer_reviews.title: A shedding nightmare of clingy fuzz
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the teal color. after I opened the package I noticed a lot of fuzz on my clothes. I threw the throw into the wash with a couple of towels. There was fuzz all over the towels when I took them out of the washer. When I dried the load, there was still fuzz all over the towels. The throw was covered in so much fuzz that it looked like pom-pom trim. There's fuzz all over my house. I had to wash the towels a second time and I still can't get all the throw-fuzz off them.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: terrible pilling after mutli washes, will probably fall apart
customer_reviews.text: This blanket pills so bad that it makes a terrible mess. I have washed and dried it many times but it keeps pilling so bad to the point that the pills fall on the floor, stick to your clothes and furniture. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress

customer_reviews.title: I can't get it to stop shedding.
customer_reviews.text: It immediately started shedding as soon as I started using it, leaving green fuzz all over my clothes, floor and couch. I have washed and dried it several times in hope's of removing the loose fibers, it hasn't seemed to help. I'm about ready to throw it in the trash because of the shedding. Very disappointed at this point in time.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: it is soft but so terribly thin. Other customers posted pictures of pets on ...
customer_reviews.text: I would never use the word plush in description...couldnt believe size of the box.. opened plastic..it is soft but so terribly thin. Other customers posted pictures of pets on their blanket. Well this'was bought for a 12 year old grandchild to cuddle up with. Back it goes...for the same price can buy a nice soft throw that can actually be used.
customer_reviews.author: book reader

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value compared to most big box stores. Will fall apart after gentle wash.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is decent over all but I feel the price paid was too much for what I got. Our local stores seemed to have better made blankets at the same price. We ordered a pink color and it is a very light shade of pink. If you plan on running this through a gentle wash cycle be aware that it'll start coming apart. UPDATE: 12/4/2018 I just wanted to update this review and say this company's customer service is top notch. They personally reached out to me and offered to replace or refund the blanket. They seemed concerned and wanted feedback to help improve their product. I would give them another chance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Campbell

customer_reviews.title: A big mess
customer_reviews.text: From the first wash of this blanket the fabric began to shed. It left little balls of fluff everywhere. I washed it again on delicate, cold water and the shedding got worse. A few weeks later I had to wash it again and the balls of fluff are pilled up on the blanket making it look cheap and horrible. It leaves fluff everywhere and is a big mess. This blanket is such a disappointment as the chocolate color was great and it felt so soft. You can’t have a blanket that you can’t ever wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Kidman

customer_reviews.title: A Steal
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these from Amazon Warehouse deals, both in brown. As another reviewer mentioned, the colors were 2 different browns. One was deeper which didn't bother me as they are in 2 different rooms. One side of one of the blankets was covered in fuzzy pills (probably why it was in warehouse deals), on the other did not. As a result I expected it to fuzz like crazy when I washed them, but they didn't. They came out just fine (I didn't dry them though). They are really soft, wash well, and if you have pets, they will try to keep them for themselves. Not too heavy which is what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: BK NY

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.  Take the love back it's awful.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen or felt this yet because I had it sent to my grandson who is 7. He loves it and wraps himself in it every night to sleep... according to what his mother told me. Having to edit this review. When I got there a few weeks later it was a mess. It was shedding so bad it looked like his bed had a disease. I would take pictures but I'm so disgusted that I am throwing all of his bedding in the laundry right away and throwing his purple snugly away. It is a big disappointment. If I could give it less than one star, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Holtzlander

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Lint
customer_reviews.text: I have washed this blanket 3 times since I purchased it, including today's wash. I would get all this shedding, not knowing where it was coming from to begin with. Then upon a closer look today, I noticed around the edges of the blanket, it had tons of lint...or pilling...it was all over the place. I now must look for another blanket. This is horrible. I loved everything about the blanket otherwise. Because of this I do not recommend. I had a mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Horrible pilling And fuzzies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket despite some negative reviews about pilling. I received it today, and washed it and dried it. A terrible mess of fuzzies and pills appeared on the blanket. When I took it out of the dryer the fuzzies attached to me my clothes and all over my laundry room. I am returning it ASAP. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Way too light, IMO
customer_reviews.text: The throw size is too small, but that's my fault for not measuring out the dimensions. My issue with this blanket is with how terribly thin it is. It is virtually weightless and provides nothing but texture. If all you're looking for is a soft surface, this is good for you. But, per my own taste, this is not really ideal if you're looking to wrap up for a cozy couch potato session. If it's a chilly day, do not count on this item to provide any sort of warmth. I would spend the extra money for a heavier, larger blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Thin, falling apart after first wash
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is thin however it is very soft so I still gave it a chance. After the first wash the threads started coming loose and after the second wash the seams are completely apart and the fleece is even thinner than before! The fabric pilled and there is fuzz everywhere! Not worth the money at all!! I will go to HomeGoods when they open again, much better quality for less money there. Update: I will not return a USED blanket I just want my money back for something I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: I love these blankets (I have the purple and the white). There was purple fuzz on my black sheets for a little bit, but over time that went away and they’ve been perfect since. The only issue I have (which is my own fault, I guess) is that my purple one was dried on too high of a heat(laundromat instead of home), and now it’s as if it melted or something in areas all over the blanket and they feel scratchy (almost crusty?). It’s rough on my skin and my entire purpose for buying these was my skin sensitivity due to fibromyalgia, so I’ll have to replace my purple one, and make sure not to dry it
customer_reviews.author: ereka

customer_reviews.title: Pulling, shedding, “fuzz balls”
customer_reviews.text: I bought a grey version of the blanket, and the fuzz ball reviews are all correct. All my sheets, pajamas, and items that I washed with my sheets and pajamas are covered in gray fuzz from the shedding blanket. I’ve washed it, dried it, and even went as far as to use a “fabric defuzzer” that I bought for pilling sweaters. Nothing works. DO NOT BUY. From the reviews I’ve skimmed, it might be specific to just some colors... but not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Just not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was much thinner than expected . I guess I missed the “ lightweight “ description. Picture makes it look thick and fluffy ( it is not). Came rolled up very tight in a plastic roll. Also Way too many specific instructions for cleaning. I was expecting something I could throw in the washer and dryer and apparently this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann johnson

customer_reviews.title: Use small and cold water heat no fluff....
customer_reviews.text: First of all I was afraid of buying this blanket cause of these negative reviews I took a chance anyway I ordered it after received it I followed instruction how to wash it put it in the machine my blanket actually came out the same way I did put it in there,let me give you a little advice don't wash it on load size super or hot use small and cold water for auto dry don't use heavy duty use fluff air no heat or just cool down if you need it asap and then you should ready to go I hope my review was helpful and thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff🤴🏾

customer_reviews.title: Pills everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have this blanket in two other colors but something about the quality of this one is horrible. It’s pilled all over my house and hasn’t stopped even after a few runs through the washer and dryer. It’s all over my house. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou Warriner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft, warm blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket exceeds all my expectations! I ordered it because of all the great reviews and it doesn’t disappoint. It is so soft and warm without being bulky and it is exactly what I was looking for. I cannot wait to spend my Sundays cuddled up under it binge watching Netflix with the hubby! :)
customer_reviews.author: Stupid fudgecicle

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket ever
customer_reviews.text: Best blanket ever! I was looking for a very soft blanket that was not heavy but just enough to keep the bed a little warmer. I tend to sleep very warm and usually have a foot sticking out the side of the bed which helps cool me off. But the blanket is very soft and the color is beautiful and it fits perfectly on our king size bed. My husband is not a connoisseur of blankets or anything else and he commented on how much he likes this blanket. Which if your husbands like mine that is really something.
customer_reviews.author: Burger Lover - Dalton

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sizes - Twin & Queen - one for the sofa, one for the bed. I already have a handful of "throw" sizes that are very warm & snuggly, but really wanted bigger. These are true to size, so soft, thinner than the double layers throws I have, but still really warm. In searching for warm blankets, i saw alot of reviews/pictures of other brands with damage/defects. These both came in perfect condition. I also received an email from the seller with care instructions. I, personally, always pay attention to care labels with whatever I purchase, but I know many who don't, so thought that was a nice touch in keeping our purchases as snuggly as possible.
customer_reviews.author: ksc30

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this blanket, but...
customer_reviews.text: It won't stay on the bed!!! It is super slippery. It feels wonderful and it's a perfect weight, but if you move in bed, it's literally at the foot in minutes. I've never seen anything like it. I hate to give only a four star review, but it crawls to the foot of the bed every night and makes a huge ordeal out of making the bed in the morning. It may work better if put right next to the body, but I have it between the top sheet and quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket for my newly adopted senior dog. She has been through so much that I wanted to make sure she has special things especially her pink blanket. I received it very quickly but it doesn't look so much like the picture. It isn't that plump and much smaller than I expected and didn't like it. I tried to get it back but had to jump through hoops to send it back and then. When it came time to wash it I did so in the gentle cycle and it still faded almost see-through. This blanket is not worth the money. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: SpiroPapa

customer_reviews.title: Best fuzzy blanket
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I was taking a risk buying this blanket on a flash sale but I did NOT regret it for one second. You probably already know what my fear was but once I washed it not one fuzz ball was to be found. My mom loved cozying up with it so much when she was staying with us that I sent one to her place to greet her when she got back home. Nice and warm and soft in the turquoise teal color.
customer_reviews.author: erinsyrupy

customer_reviews.title: Talk about shedding! Its like having a German Shepard, again.
customer_reviews.text: I washed this blanket before using it, I had a lot of lint in the washer and dryer. The next week I ran it threw the washer twice. Still tons of lint, then after using the washer I had lint on everything else I washed. Needless to say after apron. 20 (washes at least) I said ENOUGH and bought another blanket. I would NOT recommend this blanket at all! I still am putting sheets on the bed and having to use a lint roller from that blanket. Even though my sheets have all been washed they are still full of the lint.. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Has some issues
customer_reviews.text: Washed before use (followed wash instructions according to tag) and fuzz started coming off immediately and they now have bald spots. Good thing it's just for furniture covering. Color is not as vibrant as shown also. I purchased these in red and they came out more of a deep mauve. **Great customer service** After reviewing this item the customer service for this product contacted me and was very apologetic and wanted to make things right. They issued me a great offer and I excepted it. I would buy from them again because of the quality of their customer service. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: m.walker

customer_reviews.title: Pilly nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This blanket feels soft at first but after one wash it pills like a SOB. Do not buy this unless you never wash your blankets or like lint all over all of your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to replace the blankets for the couch/living room but was skeptical because they were a little cheap. I have also felt a blanket made of the same material that was stiff, and gross feeling. These are bomb!!!! I now have bought 3 more and couldn't be happier! They are super soft, and have a great color selection. If you are anything like me, you may not know sizing very well. The smallest one isn't quite big enough for an adult sitting in the couch, but it would be for just a lap blanket. The next size up is perfect for an adult laying down to watch TV :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product, lint everywhere !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket in the king size, it has so many great reviews I just don’t understand why my blankets are horrible. it is constantly shedding navy colored lint all over everything so I decided to wash it then dry it hoping it would get better but it came out of the dryer unbearable! Stay away from this blanket if its intended for human use it may be acceptable at the bottom of a dogs cage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and so soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these blankets! They are not too heavy, but are so cuddly and keep you warm. I bought one for my daughter and my Mom and they both use them every night instead of their comforters. I washed both of them separately, on cold and gentle, and dried them on low... And NO FUZZIES! I have so many soft blankies that turn into fuzz balls when I wash them, but not these blankets! Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Krueger

customer_reviews.title: No major shedding; heres my wash care
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light blue to go with my ocean decor. I read the reviews which I always do before buying anything anywhere now even if it's in stores I check the reviews on Amazon first. I have had no issues with shedding like other reviewers. Honestly I think they may have washed it wrong. I washed this on waterproof/bedding cycle, medium load, tap cold and timed dry 60 minutes high temperature. This is the perfect blanket for the desert states of the us. It keeps you comfy and worm but you dont sweat from it being too thick. It has a silky feel which I love. Great for animals too.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: More blue than teal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the teal king-size blanket. Overall it's an okay blanket for $25. Fairly soft, light weight, doesn't shed, with a beautiful deep saturated color. Unfortunately the color is not a true teal. It actually reminds me of the color of blue fruit loops. More of a blue than a blue-green. In the background of my picture on the right you will see a teal changing pad for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this product is not falsely advertised. It was the size and color I ordered and yes, of course it was soft. I give 3 stars only because I have 2 different fleece blankets from Costco for the exact same price as this one and they are very clearly better quality. The two Costco blankets have a much silkier texture and you can feel the sturdy quality. I'm only writing this review so that others may consider that 14.99 can possibly buy you a better fleece blanket elsewhere. To each their own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!! Ripped on the first wash.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality!!!! I washed this blanket for the first time, followed the washing/drying instructions, and it came out with extremely thinned and with a hole. It is obviously cheap material because the edges of the hole are not charred so it was not an issue of the dryer's heat​. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, pictures misleading do not buy
customer_reviews.text: So not recommend at all. Go to target, home goods, or Walmart and buy a blanket. This the thinnest blanket ever! First, I pulled it out of a box wrapped in shrink wrap clearly from China and it smelled. It looks nothing like the pictures as it is razor razor thin. Wish for 30 dollars I spent an extra two and bought a quality blanket it will never hold up on the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Not too hot, but keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: This keeps me super warm at night with my fan on, but doesn't make me sweat in it. I've been looking forever for a blanket to use that will just keep me comfortable, and this one is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and cozy at a great price point!
customer_reviews.text: First off, this blanket is the most yellow blanket I've ever seen, it's absolutely lovely and it's just a joy to look at. Second off, I LOVE all things cozy, especially blankets, so I could not resist a new one in my favorite color, especially at such an affordable price point for such a big blanket. After having washed and dried it and slept with it for a night, I can confirm it's super soft, even after the wash, and awesomely cozy! It's always great to have extra blankets, especially living up in Alaska. The packaging was also super compact and convenient, really giftable if you're looking for a sweet little gift. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Looks great until you wash it
customer_reviews.text: This pilled SO MUCH. I feel like anyone who wrote a good review is either a spam or hasn't washed it. I like to wash things before using them and when I did there was fuzz EVERYWHERE. I washed a second time to give it a chance, and still fuzz everywhere. My washer and dryer are coated. Anything it touches is coated. It's like the cat in the hat. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Casper, RD @NourishedBite

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BLANKET!! Washed it one time and it shedded apart in the dryer! I wish i could return it but my return window expired. Guess i'll use it as a travel dog blanket or something. Dont waste your money like i did!
customer_reviews.author: Richkidd99

customer_reviews.title: "Lightweight" translates to "thin" and too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but it is too thin. I understand that it was described as lightweight, but that's hard to quantify under you see it in person. For some people, this might be perfectly fine, but for me it was too thin. Also, I mistakenly bought the "throw" size, which is way too small. I bought it on Prime so sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vhuber101

customer_reviews.title: Nice sofa covering!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover my sofa which is showing it's age. The queen size covers the seating area nicely, and is very soft and velvety. It looks fantastic. Another big plus is our kitties love to lay on it and it doesn't noticeably grab cat fur either. The directions it came with said to wash it by itself, which we've done. It comes out nice and velvety every time. Overall, it's held up really nicely and I'll definitely purchase another when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was a huge disappointment especially since I had read so many positive reviews about it. To start off, the blanket is actually very soft but it gives off a lot of lint. I thought that if I washed it enough it would stop but washing did nothing. Another thing is that this blanket isn't very warm. The fleece is very thin, so sometimes I get cold at night. I do, however live in Texas and here we all sleep with the ceiling fan on with the AC on. Still, the blanket is pretty thin. It is lightweight. I guess, if you want a thin blanket that gives off lint, then yea this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful blanket for our needs here in Georgia
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket. It is one of the first blankets I have bought for my king bed that is actually large enough to drape over the sides and end! I have bought several others and they barely cover the top. It has such a nice feel to it, too. A very soft and smooth feeling and a perfect weight for me. I really hate being weighed down by heavy blankets so I could not have found a better fit for my needs. It is just warm enough to be comfortable but not roast me at night and it looks great in my room too!
customer_reviews.author: JaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great color and value!
customer_reviews.text: We got the 108x90" for our Cal King size bed. We just got it and I couldn't wait to pair it with our flannel sheets as we move into chilly fall nights! I've been looking for a yellow blanket for a while now, and all I have found is gold or pastel yellow. This is a sunflower yellow; exactly what I wanted!! When I saw the box it came in I was worried it would be too thin or cheap. I'm happy to say it's a perfect, cozy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the reviews lead you to believe
customer_reviews.text: After my wife received the gift of an amazing throw that the entire family seems to covet now I have been on the hunt for an equal to hers. This one sorely disappoints. It is soft, but not that lofty, fluffy, super warm soft. Just a soft to the hand feel but thin, and honestly... it seems a bit "cheep" in comparison to hers. We found a killer one at Costco that is probably the best find for the money to date. She even steals it now on occasion. This throw though will leave you wanting more loft, fluff and heft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as big as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am giving this a 4 star instead of a 5 is because I was looking for a lightweight blanket for one of my twin beds (to match another that is not available at this time). It matches the color, softness and weight which is what I was looking for, but it does not cover my twin bed like the original blanket I bought elsewhere did. If it were a few inches longer and wider, I would be very happy with it. As it is, I will probably look for my other blanket when it becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase unless you like fuzzy stuff everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this bed sure throw (50 x 60) to place on my new couch. I washed it in cold water and dried on low. I should’ve noticed something was wrong as there were all these fuzzy things in my washer and then I had to change the filter three times when drying it on low. Fuzzy stuff everywhere! So many...I got tired of picking them off - will always happen when washed! Definitely sending this back. Very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly soft, beautiful colour!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. I got the Queen Size in purple for my double bed. When it was cold I snuggled under it with lots of room to spare. Now that it's summer, I've packed up my thick quilt and use this blanket to cover the entire bed. The pop of colour is rich and pretty for the colour scheme and the size is perfect. I haven't used it long enough yet to see how it stands up to a wash, but I love how it feels so far! I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,but shed a lot of fine lint.
customer_reviews.text: Sheds too much lint...very surprised this product doesn't have a clean use factor since breathing issues become triggered by the lint from the manufacturing ..On the other hand the color is gorgeous and sensory wise it is amazing till I was sneezing and eyes teared till I washed it and realized I was covered with purple lint while folding it after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hadeler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and will unravel after washing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket in March as a throw for my recliner. I didn’t use the blanket until May. I have washed this blanket 3 times and today it has completely come apart and now has fur balls all over it! Unfortunately the return window is over however, I wouldn’t purchase this item again! Hopefully the manufacturer will read this review and try to make their product with better quality in the future. Spend more money for a normal size throw that won’t unravel when you wash it. By the way I Never used fabric softener for this item per the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Phone Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Worst shedding EVER! The softest piece of trash... I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so super soft I thought I was in love!! And then I woke up to black fuzz balls all over my pajamas, floor, pillows and hair! I have washed it twice and put it in the dryer 4 times.... Still full of fuzz balls. USELESS! Pictures of the blanket and the sock I put in the dryer with it. Looks just like the socks I had on the only night I slept with it. I threw them away before taking a Pic hoping once I wash the blanket it would stop shedding!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: So soft.
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the lookout for a blanket that’s not super heavy and thick. I’m not a big fan of sleeping with blankets, but sometimes you want something light to cover yourself with. This blanket is perfect for my needs. It’s light and super soft. It’s on the smaller size so I’ll be sure to order the larger one soon. It’s olive green in color which I find is sometimes hard to capture in a picture. But the color is spot on in person. Glad I decided to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Collins

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical About Washing
customer_reviews.text: The horror story here seems to be about trying to wash this blanket. Bedsure seems to have conquered the "softness" category with this fabric by making it so thin there's hardly anything to it--hence "Lightweight" appears in the title. Then its overall size barely covers as well (glad I didn't go smaller). It looks and feels nice though, and three or four of these might actually make a real blanket. Now if only I dare to wash it. Those three stars are looking a little shaky.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Baysinger

customer_reviews.title: Pills horribly
customer_reviews.text: We got the brown one. It is so soft and keeps us just right in the summer. We did wash it before we used it, of course. It pilled horribly and has every time we've washed it since. We would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE Purchase! Ruined My New Sheets!!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft blanket but it RUINED, beyond repair, my brand new pink Egyptian Cotton sheets! I tried washing again, rerinsing several times, but this blanket totally stung us. In fact I had to literally discard a couple of clothing items that I’d washed with it. Terrible purchase andte it did a lot of irreversible damage!! Do not buy it, especially if you ever plan to wash it, which you should.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Edwards

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GET THE DARK GREY BLANKET
customer_reviews.text: So I got the dark navy blue blanket and the dark grey blanket. The Navy Blue one had no issues, washed and dried without much lint or any excessive fluff. The dark grey one however was abysmal. I washed and dried it twice and even extended the second round in the dryer. And it was still producing a ludicrous amount of lint. I have ordered the burgundy blanket and hope that one will turn out better. I was excited after the navy blue blanket turned out so well, and the staggering difference with the dark grey was baffling. I mean seriously how can it produce that much fluffy dryer lint?!?
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty blanket? Yes Is it soft and warm? Yes However, it's a waste of money. The amount of fuzz that comes out of this blanket is ridiculous!! The quality is the worst!! Even days after I finally put it away, I was still sweeping that fuzz from all over my bedroom. the most annoying thing in the world!!! If you don't wanna have to give it away, like I had to, just don't waste your money with this. Terrible and cheap quality, just BAD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTO VAZQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Better Options Out There
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with this blanket is how think it is. Although it's big, I was looking for a thicker blanket with some weight. If you're looking for a simple blanket to keep on your couch for cold nights, it works nicely. But naps with this isn't the best. Again, it's not what I was looking for according to the description, but it's lightweight and seems to do the job for the most part. Just a disappointed over how thin it was.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Everybody in our house has had one of these for at least a year. Everybody still loves them. When we went on a trip over spring break, both kids tried to pack their blankets. My 15 year old said he didn’t have room for his clothes. They were heartbroken to have to leave their blankets at home. We recently bought one as a Christmas present for a dog we no longer foster because he loved ours so much. They’re super soft after 100 (hyperbolic) washes and haven’t faded, thinned, or picked up fuzz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: After washing only 2 times this blanket completely ruined 4 large bath towels and 5 hand towels. The blanket completely fell apart and keft huge clumps of lint on every square inch of the other items in the wash with this horrible blanket!!! Do nit purchase this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: It's not a heavy blanket at all! If you want a heavy blanket then this is not for you. Its a great size, very soft and keeps us warm. The package was impeccable! It was delivered inside of a separate box than the Amazon prime box. Then it was wrapped in plastic for protection from anything that could have leaked through the boxes. There was NO smell to the blanket such as the dye smell that accompanies some blankets. Very professional! It will be a great buy for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a lot of these blankets in many sizes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the soft and plush you are looking for. Excellent product. I have a bunch of them
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Like others have this blanket sheds. I bought a black queen size, washed it on gentle after it arrived but that did not help. This blanket is shedding very badly. I can't really understand why there are so many positive reviews. I wouldn't pay five bucks for this things, it's falling apart and likely these little fibers are being breathe in. I have other fleece blankets (different) brands that do not have this problem. I would look for another fleece blanket. There are ones that don't fall apart and cost less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lint EVERYWHERE.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS unless you never plan to wash it. It literally unravels into a million pieces of lint you cannot get off. If it touches anything the lint gets everywhere. I had to throw it away after I tried everything imaginable to get the lint off. I also had to toss my yoga towel that became covered with lint from this blanket. Please save your money and do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this blanket, but the shedding is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: Its luxuriously soft, light, and a beautiful rich navy blue color but I cannot get this thing to stop shedding fuzzies ALL over my bed. The fuzzies cling to jersey sheets like nobody's business. I haven't tested it out on regular cotton sheets, but I can't imagine it would be much different. I've washed it several times trying to get the shedding to subside to no avail. IDK how this has so many positive reviews given how much fluff it leaves behind, I'm a little suspicious they're fake reviews. Hopefully I can still return it, in which case I'd consider getting a different blanket from Bedsure. I'll edit my rating/review if so.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, washes well so far
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is super soft and velvety. I have ordered other brands in the past that have shed or pilled. I have only had it a few days and washed it once, but so far it still looks and feels perfect after going through the wash. It's warm and exactly what I was looking for as a cozy blanket for under my bedspread.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Super soft fuzzy bed blanket
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I was hesitant for a minute because a few reviews said it did not wash well but they must have used improper settings as I’ve had zero issues. It’s very soft and washes easily. I was looking for a fuzzy blanket in twin size because my husband was using a weighted blanket in bed so I wanted one that would only take up half the bed and this fit that bill perfectly! They also offered black which was the color I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Sheds to much!
customer_reviews.text: Blanket was soft, light weight and big. On limited income but I got the blanket to cover a lift chair my brother had bought for me. He passed away from cancer shortly after. So I bought this blanket to protect the chair. But after washing it, it was shedding. Even after drying it there was so much loose stuff getting all over the place, I had to use a lint brush to get it off the blanket. Actually have a quart bag full of the stuff that shedded off the blanket. Would return it but I'm disabled and it's to hard to get to the post. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: SOFT BUT THIN NOT WARM
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a warm soft throw for the sofa. The throw is very soft however very thin fleece so it is not warm. I live in Florida and its not keeping me warm on the rare 60's nights. This is made in China and it thinner than a velour top, not serving the purpose if I had known this I would have bought something else. I wanted something to keep me warm and this throw doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Star

customer_reviews.title: Permanently stained dryer & SHEDS!!
customer_reviews.text: Originally was going to buy when it was featured on “Dral if the Day” but missed that so went ahead and bought at full price. Wish I could return, 1) stain ruined my dryer, 2) sheds so badly that you cannot wash with anything else, and 3) TOTALLY out of square which drives me nuts trying to make the bed. As the saying goes...you get what you pay for. It is supper soft and lightweight, but that’s about it!
customer_reviews.author: Mcwaters

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft, but the blanket is a bit small (I can't lay down with it and have my whole body covered, and I'm 5'9") and it's VERY lightweight. I did NOT notice that in the description. If you're looking for the typical lush soft fleece blanket, then this isn't the one for you. If you really want a lightweight but soft blanket, then this could be a good fit. This will not keep you warm in snowy winter... this is perfect for a chilly summer morning. I got the navy blue color, and it's a great rich navy blue... love that color.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Pilon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these blankets and found them to be very high quality. They hardly shed at all and, as long as you follow the cleaning directions, they'll last a long time and still look new. I use them to protect my comforter on my bed, but they feel and look nice enough to use as a regular lightweight cover. As a plus, the customer service from the seller can't be beat. I reached out to them after receiving one that didn't live up to the others I've purchased. After describing the issue, they immediately issued a credit for a replacement. This is a great product and seller - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! It's so soft and lightweight, my pets have been trying to take it over. The color was true to the pic but it seems to be more vibrant than in the pics. I dont like my bedding to be heavy and I dont like my bedding to not keep me warm enough. This blanket is exactly what I've been looking for. I have been able to sleep with just a sheet and this blanket and sleep comfortably all night. I got a king size for my queen bed but I would have liked it just a little bigger but it looks great anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Insert Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Treat it gently and it will treat you gently
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought a second one of these. I was concerned about pilling and lint but it has not been a problem. I wash it on gentle cycle by itself and hand to dry. At the end, I may put it into dryer for a short air fluff, but it dries pretty quickly. I love to sleep in it like a sleeping bag...put half on top of my bottom sheet and wrap the other half over the top of myself. I'm cushioned in soft fleece all around. I have an extra heavy fleece blanket if it's cold, but this one is usually plenty because I use it top and bottom. So cushy and welcoming for an inveterate insomniac!
customer_reviews.author: Variety Pack

customer_reviews.title: Bought One and Went Back for Another
customer_reviews.text: Super silky soft and pretty. Beautiful color. Thought about gifting it but want to keep them both (because I bought a gold one, too!). Nice quality. They look great on my new couch. Actually going to but a pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer H

customer_reviews.title: Third time was NOT the charm
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I bought 2 of these a year ago. They were wonderful. This one basically disintegrated when washed. It had to be thrown away. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: J's Ebie
